div.p: The spatial distribution of the monthly averaged differences of ( a) solar radiation, ( b) 2-m air temperature, ( c) precipitation, ( d) 2-m absolute humidity, ( e) planetary boundary layer height, and ( f) 10-m wind fields between future meteorology in 2050, 2051, and 2052 and the present emission (FUTMET) and the present meteorology in 2014, 2015, and 2016 and the present (PREMET) during the daytime (from 7:00 to 18:00 LST).
